oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Benjamin and Frances Hooks - How They Met and How He Proposed"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; Hooks, Frances; family life;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An article from Ebony magazine in 1981 about Benjamin and Frances Hooks, telling the story of how they met and how he proposed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by Matthew Hicks and Katie Jakovich; Donated by Patricia Hooks Gray;
